data.name: Nightcrawler
data.description: The swashbuckling blue Nightcrawler can teleport, sword-fight, and perform acrobatic feats to dazzle his enemies, all with a smile on his face.

starItems.name: Nightcrawler
starItems.description: The swashbuckling blue Nightcrawler can teleport, sword-fight, and perform acrobatic feats to dazzle his enemies, all with a smile on his face.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance against targets with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary attack
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance against targets with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary attack
On Crit, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> and for each other Crit from this ability, prolong the duration of that <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> by <color=#86e619>1</color>

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance against targets with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary attack
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

On Crit, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. For each other Crit from this ability, prolong the duration of that <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance against targets with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target on the last Bonus Attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, on the last Bonus Attack, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

On Crit, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. For each other Crit from this ability, prolong the duration of that <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance against targets with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within infinite spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within infinite spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Rebound Chain to an additional target
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for a non-<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally with the highest Damage.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets within infinite spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:

 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
